plugins.name: ViveTool
plugins.description: ViveTool functionality for Lenovo Legion Toolkit / 为联想拯救者工具包提供ViveTool功能
plugins.changelog:
Version 1.4.0 (2026-01-22)
- Optimized plugin interface by removing ViVeTool status display
- Moved ViVeTool status and download to plugin configuration
- Fixed plugin extensions configuration button issues
- Enhanced multi-language support with 5 new languages
- Added bulk plugin import functionality
- Improved plugin store with icon background colors
plugins.author: Crs10259

plugins.description: NetworkAcceleration functionality for Lenovo Legion Toolkit / 为联想拯救者工具包提供网络加速功能
plugins.changelog:
Version 1.4.0 (2026-01-24)
- Fixed missing translations for plugin snackbar messages
- Fixed hardcoded English text in plugin UI elements
- Added support for Steam, Discord, npm, and PyPI acceleration
- Fixed plugin download URL issues
- Updated to work with Lenovo Legion Toolkit v3.4.1
plugins.author: LenovoLegionToolkit Team
plugins.name: NetworkAcceleration
